audioEffects.title: Audio Effects
audioEffects.subtitle: Transform your voice
audioEffects.selectEffectPrompt: Click on an effect to configure it

voiceCoder.title: Perfect Voice
voiceCoder.description: Automatic pitch correction for perfect singing

quickConfig.label: Quick Config
quickConfig.tooltip: Choose a preset suited to your needs, or customize your own settings

retuneSpeed.label: Speed
retuneSpeed.tooltip: Pitch correction speed. Slow (0-30%) = very natural and smooth. Medium (30-70%) = balanced. Fast (70-100%) = robotic effect

strength.label: Strength
strength.tooltip: Auto-tune intensity. Higher = more perfect voice but less natural. Recommended: 30-50% for subtle effect

naturalVibrato.label: Expression
naturalVibrato.tooltip: Preserves natural variations and vibrato in your voice. Higher = more expression and emotion preserved

pitch.label: Pitch
pitch.tooltip: Transpose your voice up (+) or down (-). Example: +3 = 3 semitones higher

harmonization.label: Vocal Harmonies
harmonization.tooltip: Adds harmonic backing vocals to your main voice for a choir effect

pitch.label: Voice Pitch
pitch.tooltip: Higher = more high-pitched and childlike voice. Recommended: 8-12 for baby effect

formant.label: Timbre
formant.tooltip: Changes voice color and timbre to simulate shorter vocal cords

breathiness.label: Breathiness
breathiness.tooltip: Adds a soft, airy breath effect characteristic of a child's voice

pitch.label: Voice Pitch
pitch.tooltip: Lower = deeper and scarier voice. -10 to -12 for intense demonic effect

distortion.label: Distortion
distortion.tooltip: Adds aggressive and rough texture to the voice

reverb.label: Echo
reverb.tooltip: Reverberation effect like in a dark, deep cathedral

backSound.title: Background Ambiance
backSound.uploadDescription: Preset sounds are not yet available. Upload your own MP3/WAV file

volume.label: Volume
volume.tooltip: Adjusts the volume of background music mixed with your voice

loopMode.label: Playback mode
loopMode.tooltip: Choose how to repeat the audio: a specific number of times or for a duration in minutes
